title: ‘We Need to Act Now’: USA National Team Member Magnus White and Others to Be Commemorated with 8,423 Minute Fundraiser
content:
Symbolic number represents the vast scale of traffic-related deaths last year: ‘We cannot afford to sit back and hope for slow policy changes.'

Read the full article at ‘We Need to Act Now’: USA National Team Member Magnus White and Others to Be Commemorated with 8,423 Minute Fundraiser on Velo.
author: sstokes
